description: One of the many interesting aspects of the new wave of artificial intelligence systems is that with them, copyright has moved from the fringe to center stage. title: If AI Agents Catch On, Expect The Legacy Copyright Industry To Turn Them Against You

description: T-Mobile has long been a hot mess on issues of security and privacy. Distracted by its problematic merger with Sprint, T-Mobile was hacked eight times in less than five years, leaking oodles of sensitive customer information onto the open web. The company was also a key player in gobbling up user sensitive location data to […]
title: Whoops: T-Mobile Reveals Names, Real-Time Locations Of Customers’ Kids

title: Texas Judge Says Prior Restraint Is Cool And Legal While Silencing A Critic Of PTK Honor Society

title: Trump’s State Department Is Scanning Visa Applicants’ Social Media Accounts For Anti-US Content

description: The Supreme Court yesterday effectively provided the executive branch with a technical manual for legally disappearing people to foreign slave labor camps. title: Supreme Court Hides Behind Ridiculous Procedural Argument To Allow Human Trafficking To Continue
